function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased tourism can lead to the spread of contagious diseases in protected conservation areas (PCAs).","Impact":"The spread of contagious diseases in PCAs can harm the biodiversity and the health of both wildlife and visitors.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, limiting the number of visitors, and conducting health screenings can help lower the risk of disease spread.","Technologies":"Use of contactless payment systems, digital visitor tracking, and advanced sanitation technology can help mitigate the risk.","People":"Visitors, local communities, and wildlife in PCAs are at risk.","Owner":"Local authorities, conservation organizations, and tourism operators can implement the mitigation measures."}]}
